body_html: @zheng-xq Any remaining concerns? Regarding formatting, I ended up using clang-format --fallback-style="Google" < input.cc so I hope that is enough to resolve formatting. I think I addressed all the other concerns for the last review as well.

body: @zheng-xq Any remaining concerns? Regarding formatting, I ended up using `clang-format --fallback-style="Google" < input.cc` so I hope that is enough to resolve formatting. I think I addressed all the other concerns for the last review as well.
